text: Joshua ga helekai gi digau huogodoo, “Deenei di mee a Dimaadua go di God o Israel e helekai ai, ‘I mua loo, godou maadua mmaadua nogo noho i di baahi i golo di monowai go Euphrates, nogo daumaha gi nia balu ieidu. Tangada e dahi i digaula go Terah, tamana o Abraham mo Nahor.24.2 Genesis 11.27
